THE VINTAGE CAKE CO.

The Vintage Cake Co. is a charming cafe and bakery dedicated to preserving the timeless art of baking vintage cakes. Our menu features a variety of classic cake flavors from different eras, all made with the finest ingredients and baked fresh daily. Whether you're in the mood for a rich and decadent chocolate cake from the 1920s, a light and airy chiffon cake from the 1950s, or a buttery pound cake from the 1970s, we've got you covered.
